Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a brown pottery vessel, the fabric is greyish in section, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a burnished light-brown slip and remains of six lines of black-painted demotic text. Joins to EA66235.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Cemeteries and Osireion Excavations Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393780) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393780)
